effect.sun_moon: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch. Power is doubled against Pokémon that have used minimize since entering the field.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch. Power is doubled against Pokémon that have used minimize since entering the field.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch. Power is doubled against Pokémon that have used minimize since entering the field.

short_effect.sun_moon: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
short_effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
short_effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user crushes its target by rolling over the target with its rolled-up body. This may also make the target flinch.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user crushes its target by rolling over the target with its rolled-up body. This may also make the target flinch.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user crushes its target by rolling over the target with its rolled-up body. This may also make the target flinch.
